meanings.definition: Infantas (noun): plural form of infanta, a daughter of a monarch
meanings.sent1: The royal family included several infantas, daughters of the king and queen.
meanings.sent2: The infantas attended the royal ball with their parents.
meanings.sent3: The infantas giggled as they played hide-and-seek in the palace.
meanings.sent4: The infantas were like precious jewels in the crown of the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The infantas' laughter echoed through the palace halls, filling them with joy.

meanings.definition: Infantas (adjective): relating to or characteristic of an infanta
meanings.sent1: The elegant dresses worn by the princesses had an infantas charm.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated in a style that was truly infantas.
meanings.sent3: The cake at the party had an infantas touch with its delicate decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her manners were so refined, they were almost infantas in nature.
meanings.sent5: The garden had an infantas beauty, with flowers blooming in every corner.
